content.text: Match ends, Almería 1, Getafe 1.
Juan Rodríguez (Getafe) is shown the yellow card.
Second Half ends, Almería 1, Getafe 1.
Álvaro Vázquez (Getafe) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Mauro Dos Santos (Almería).
Attempt saved. Verza (Almería) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
